reviewText: I loved the game. This was okay for an anime, the story is a little weak.
This helped me complete this Title and it was shipped Fast!
First of all they sent the wrong one.  Second of all it is from the UK and will not work on the U.S. systems. =( I would like to return it but not sure how.

Love this series.  I was introduced to it by a friend while I was in film school.  Tried to buy the box set, but people were begging WAY too much for it.  Found getting the series this way was much easier and cheaper.  Plus, you get all kinds of really great artwork.  Either way, this is one of my favorite Animes.  Get these while you still can.
This is a wonderful series and I will recommend this series to anyone who ask me about it. A+++ !
